content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 (14.5 ounce) cans petite diced tomatoes" )

content.text: 0) Heat oil and garlic in a large saucepan or Dutch oven until garlic starts to sizzle and turn golden.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "garlic"@16:22 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large saucepan"@26:42 / TOOL )
		:loc ( tool-0-1 "Dutch oven"@46:56 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until garlic starts to sizzle and turn golden"@57:102 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add tomatoes, tomato paste, basil and oregano; bring to a simmer.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "tomatoes"@7:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "tomato paste"@17:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "basil"@31:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "oregano"@41:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "bring"@50:55 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a simmer"@59:67 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Simmer, uncovered, until sauce is thick enough for dipping, 15 to 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Simmer"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until sauce is thick enough for dipping"@22:61 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "15 to 20 minutes"@63:79 / DUR )
	)
)
